thread.title: Simone Biles And Shaq Kick Off Super Bowl With An Epic Photo
thread.title_full: Simone Biles And Shaq Kick Off Super Bowl With An Epic Photo

author: Cavan Sieczkowski
title: Simone Biles And Shaq Kick Off Super Bowl With An Epic Photo
text:
Simone Biles And Shaq Kick Off Super Bowl With An Epic Photo ðŸ™„ Cavan Sieczkowski Deputy Director, News & Analytics 
Simone Biles had an early contender for the best photo of Super Bowl Sunday before the game even started. 
The Olympic gymnast shared a snapshot with Shaq to Instagram ahead of the main event at NRG Stadium in Houston. In the pic, the 4-foot-9-inch gold medal winner stands next to the 7-foot-1-inch basketball star. 
The two made quite the duo. A photo posted by Simone Biles (@simonebiles) on Feb 5, 2017 at 1:14pm PST 
Biles, who is from Houston, spent the week with players from both the New England Patriots and the Atlanta Falcons. She also got to hang with Taylor Swift, who performed a pre-Super-Bowl show Saturday night for DIRECTV. A photo posted by Simone Biles (@simonebiles) on Jan 31, 2017 at 10:48am PST A video posted by Simone Biles (@simonebiles) on Feb 4, 2017 at 10:49am PST â€” Simone Biles (@Simone_Biles) February 5, 2017 Also on HuffPost Super Bowl National Anthems Through The Years Super Bowl National Anthems Through The Years 1 32 1967 Jazz trumpeter Al Hirt plays the national anthem prior to the start of Super Bowl I on January 15, 1967 between the Kansas City Chiefs and the Green Bay Packers at the Coliseum in Los Angeles, California.
